meanings.definition: A title of respect used to address a man in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The signiors greeted each other with a bow.
meanings.sent2: The signiors in the village were well-respected by all.
meanings.sent3: The signiors decided to have a friendly competition to see who could bake the best bread.
meanings.sent4: The signiors of the town were like pillars of strength, guiding the community through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The signiors wore elegant robes and carried themselves with dignity.

meanings.sent1: The signiors gathered for their weekly meeting.
meanings.sent2: The signiors were known for their generosity towards the less fortunate.
meanings.sent3: The signiors' hats were all different colors, making them look like a group of colorful birds.
meanings.sent4: The signiors stood together like a united front, ready to face any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The signiors' voices echoed through the grand hall, commanding attention.
